div.div: Copyright © 2020 Northern Tioga School District. All rights reserved.
Designed and Hosted by BLaST IU 17

div.h4: Governor Tom Wolf has closed all schools for the remainder of the school year. Please view his update here

The Northern Tioga School district calendar will not be changed. The last day of instruction for our students will remain June 4th, and teachers that have not met their Flex time requirements will be done on June 5th.
Online resources- In order to help you keep our students minds sharp and growing, we have made online resources available here.

p.strong: In an effort to provide more variety in meals, we are adding foods that need to be warmed. Please check your children’s bags for food that needs to be warmed before eaten.

div.h4: The Northern Tioga School District is continuing to provide meals to Families that reside in the NTSD attendance area with children between the ages of 0-18. The food pick-up areas will be open during lunch on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 11:30-12:30. The meals are prepacked and the sites are “drive through” in an effort to maintain social distancing. If you are in need of food and cannot get to a pick-up location, please contact the school to arrange delivery. See pickup location below:
